description.en: Web service to reserve and notify about upcoming Kide.app events
description.fi: Kide.app botti, joka toimii suoraan Telegramin, netin ja Discordin kautta.

pretext:
Infamous Kide.app bot that can reserve tickets straight from Telegram, command line or the web. Can be made to inform users about upcoming events and their possible detail changes. Built with Typescript. Utilizes custom built API wrapper to communicate with the Kide API endpoints.

Now archived.
